metadata.title: President summons National Assembly session on Sept 1

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Aug 29 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday summoned the session of the National Assembly to meet on September 1, 2025. Summoned on the advice of the prime minister, the session will be held on Monday at 1700 hours at the Parliament House. The House will discuss various issues of national importance.
